content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 0, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 0, Barcelona 1.
Foul by Caye Quintana (Recreativo).
Marc Bartra (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Gerard Deulofeu (Barcelona) hits the bar with a right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right. Assisted by Ibrahim Afellay.
Attempt blocked. Marc Bartra (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Fernando Vega.
Foul by Caye Quintana (Recreativo).
Diawandou Diagné (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gerard Deulofeu.
Foul by Jean Marie Dongou (Barcelona).
Fernando Vega (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Patric (Barcelona).
Blati (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Fernando Vega (Recreativo).
Substitution, Barcelona. Jean Marie Dongou replaces Juan Cámara.
Josmar Zambrano (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Cámara (Barcelona).
Hand ball by Josmar Zambrano (Recreativo).
Goal!  Recreativo 0, Barcelona 1. Joan Román (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Gerard Deulofeu (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ibrahim Afellay.
Attempt missed. Josmar Zambrano (Recreativo) right footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Dimas.
Attempt missed. Gerard Deulofeu (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
Dimas (Recreativo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Dimas (Recreativo).

Substitution, Barcelona. Lucas Gafarot replaces Alejandro Grimaldo.
Substitution, Recreativo. Dani Molina replaces Jorge.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc-André ter Stegen replaces Jordi Masip.

Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Samper replaces Sergi Roberto.

Substitution, Recreativo. Aitor García replaces Koke.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sandro Ramírez replaces Munir El Haddadi.
Substitution, Recreativo. Dimas replaces Jesús Vázquez.
